named-query.name: Book.findById
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM Book b WHERE b.bookid = :id

named-query.name: Book.findAllCategories
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT b.category FROM Book b

named-query.name: Book.findByCategory
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM Book b WHERE b.category = :category

named-query.name: User.findByUserNamePassword
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName = :user_name AND u.password = :password

named-query.name: User.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName = :user_name
